Our fight is primarily against the blindness in India and therefore, we along with our team of skilled and trained doctors and other staff provide excellent eye care facilities to people of all cate, creed, religion and gender.

title: Jan Kalyan Sewa Samiti
detailsOfAchievement: 1-Due to support of Government of India,15 bedded de-addiction centre running by Jan Kalyan Sewa Samiti has so far helped 2490 patients in recoverd from the compulsive habit of Drugs and alcohol addiction, this project has helped not only drug addicts but also society in bringing people to mainstream by capacity and confidence building measures. 2- Jan Kalyan Sewa Samiti is successfully running 10 bedded hospital for the welfare of scheduled caste, organisation has admitted 7226 patients since 2007 ,suffering from various diseases as these people belong from downtrodden ;neglected class. This project has been appreciated by the people of society. Organisation is working among the masses to make them aware about the ill effects of Drugs and alcohol substance by many interactive means i.e. by organising rally,running campaign, debates and discussion in the schools and colleges, seminar and workshops in government as well as private organization. Organization is working with a zeal and vigour during at flood management and or any other crisis; this has been recognized and appreciated by the local administration. In many other ways organization is trying to uplift the poor,destitute,marginalized,vulnerability,ST SC, women,childern etc. by assisting them though the way of counseling or moral support.
